channel.title: Distributed on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed on Arrans github.io

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

item.title: milvus-io/milvus
item.description: Milvus is a high-performance, cloud-native vector database built for scalable vector ANN search

item.title: microsoft/FluidFramework
item.description: Library for building distributed, real-time collaborative web applications

item.title: ZoneMinder/zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television software application developed for Linux which supports IP, USB and Analog cameras.

item.title: ergo-services/ergo
item.description: An actor-based Framework with network transparency for creating event-driven architecture in Golang. Inspired by Erlang. Zero dependencies.

item.title: redis/rueidis
item.description: A fast Golang Redis client that supports Client Side Caching, Auto Pipelining, Generics OM, RedisJSON, RedisBloom, RediSearch, etc.

item.title: EchoVault/SugarDB
item.description: Embeddable and distributed in-memory alternative to Redis.
